Hero.subtitle: We help teams transform data into reliable dashboards, automated workflows, and production-ready models so decisions are faster, clearer, and measurable.

Overview.title: Data consulting for analytics, automation, and business-ready tools.
Overview.desc: Zamor Data & Models helps teams turn complex data into dashboards, automated workflows, and reliable decision support — from analysis to deployment-ready tooling.

pillars.title: Business-ready clarity
pillars.short: Clean metrics, transparent logic, and decisions you can explain.
pillars.detail: We define what matters, make assumptions explicit, and deliver outputs your team can trust and act on.
pillars.moreDetail: What you actually get: a clear package of results with context and decision support.
moreBullets: Simple explanations of what drives results

pillars.title: Custom solutions
pillars.short: Tailored automation and analytics — no cookie-cutter templates.
pillars.detail: From reporting automation to operational dashboards: the approach adapts to your data, tools, and constraints.
pillars.moreDetail: Custom means the solution fits your systems and your team — not the other way around.
moreBullets: Approach chosen for your data + team constraints
Pipelines adapted to your formats and scale
Automation built around real operational steps

pillars.title: Reliable delivery
pillars.short: Clean handoff: documentation, training, and maintainable tooling.
pillars.detail: You receive clean code, clear visuals, and documentation. Not just outputs — a tool your team can use and maintain.
pillars.moreDetail: Delivery focuses on adoption: clarity, maintainability, and a smooth handoff.

Process.title: Process
Process.sub: Choose a step — preview on hover, click to lock.
Process.hintUnlocked: Hover to preview • Click to lock

steps.title: Discover
steps.lead: We define the problem, constraints, and what “success” means.
steps.details: Alignment on goals, available data, assumptions, and decision criteria — so we reduce rework and move fast with confidence.

steps.title: Plan
steps.lead: We design the approach and choose methods that fit your constraints.
steps.details: You get a concrete plan: methods, timelines, evaluation metrics, and deliverables — with risks and trade-offs made explicit.

steps.title: Deliver
steps.lead: We implement, validate, and deliver results you can reuse and extend.
steps.details: Clean code, clear visuals, and documented decisions — shipped with reproducibility and handover in mind.

Services.title: Services
Services.subtitle: Structured technical work — from analysis and modeling to automation and delivery.

items.title: Data Analysis & Modeling
items.desc: Structured analysis and custom models to extract insight from complex datasets.

items.title: Data Visualization & Communication
items.desc: Clear visual narratives that translate technical results into understandable insight.

items.title: Computational Tools & Automation
items.desc: Custom tools and scripts to automate workflows and reduce repetitive technical tasks.

items.title: Technical Web Interfaces
items.desc: Interactive interfaces to present data, models, and results in a usable format.

items.title: Technical Consulting & Method Review
items.desc: Independent review, validation, and guidance for technically demanding projects.

items.title: Reporting & Documentation
items.desc: Structured documentation so results remain clear, reproducible, and extendable.

Featured.title: Validated case studies
Featured.subtitle: Real problems, real constraints, reproducible results — presented as evidence, not a gallery.

projects.title: Matching cosmological constraints with TeV-scale inverse seesaw
projects.summary: Built a numerical pipeline to scan parameter space, solve Boltzmann equations, and reproduce baryon asymmetry while respecting neutrino data constraints.

case.problem: Need a robust exploration of parameter space with reliable numerical control — not a one-off plot.
approach: Adaptive scans + tuning routines for viable regions
Boltzmann equation solver with sanity/consistency checks
Automated plots and verification against target observables
validation: Tracks equilibrium behavior and washout regimes

projects.title: Leggett–Garg inequalities tested with neutrino oscillation data
projects.summary: Designed a statistical pipeline to evaluate Leggett–Garg signatures using experimental neutrino oscillation datasets and produce clean, publication-grade visuals.

case.problem: Experimental data is messy — the goal was to extract reliable LGI indicators and compare prediction vs data consistently.
approach: Custom processing pipeline for experimental datasets
Computation of LGI metrics across L/E regimes
validation: Consistency checks across bins and regimes
Separation of prediction vs data visualization logic

Footer.tagline: Scientific data analysis, modeling & technical solutions.
Footer.metaText: Clear scope, clean deliverables, and documentation-first handoff.
